icesSharePoint
=======

icesSharePoint provides helper functions for the Transparent Assessment Framework (TAF)
used by [ICES](http://www.ices.dk/Pages/default.aspx).

<!-- icesSharePoint is implemented as an [R](https://www.r-project.org) package and
available on [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/package=icesSharePoint). -->

Installation
------------

icesSharePoint can be installed from GitHub using the `install_github` command from the
`devtools` package:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(devtools)
install_github("ices-tools-prod/icesSharePoint")
```

Usage
-----

For a summary of the package:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(icesSharePoint)
?icesSharePoint
```
